overview: A musical love triangle of Prince Amar, Princess Rohini and Ragini, wherein Amar is in love with Rohini not aware of Ragini's love for him. The relationship between the couple turns into hatred for each other after Aswapal's continuous efforts to create misunderstanding between them. Amar is in a dilemma and is forced to believe that there is no truth in relationships.
title: Ek Aur Amar Premm
